title: Presentation of regulation made by the Minister of Sports under Section 41 of the Sports Law, No.25 of 1973
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Mahindananda Aluthgamage, Minister of Sports, to submit the Gazette Extraordinary No.1793/3 dated 2013?01?15 containing regulations made by him under the  Sports Law, No. 25 of 1973,  to Parliament for approval, was approved by the Cabinet.
